Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

{XML_SPECIES_ASSEMBLY@RACE@DESCRIPTION_SHORT}[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000D]Arc[/hyperlink] Weapons Groups[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000F]Firearms[/hyperlink] Weapons Groups[/bullet][bullet]Reassemble fallen units, bringing them back to life[/bullet][bullet]Gather extra resources from battlefield victories[/bullet][bullet]Excellent research capabilities[/bullet][bullet]Racial Ability: Natural resistance to [damagewave/]Arc Damage.[/bullet][/bulletList]

{XML_SPECIES_ASSEMBLY@RACE@DESCRIPTION_SHORT}[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000D]电弧[/hyperlink]武器组[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000F]枪炮[/hyperlink]武器组[/bullet][bullet]重装并复活阵亡单位[/bullet][bullet]战斗胜利可获得额外资源[/bullet][bullet]优异的研究能力[/bullet][bullet]种族技能：对[damagewave/]电弧伤害拥有天然抵抗。[/bullet][/bulletList]
The {text} inserts the DESCRIPTION_SHORT text below.

The [hyperlink,0000039E00000018]Assembly[/hyperlink] is a race of cyborgs born from destruction. These people aim to bring their new-found peace to the universe by breaking down the chaos of the galaxy and reassembling it into a perfect new whole.
[hyperlink,0000039E00000018]半机械人[/hyperlink]是从毁灭中诞生的电子机械人种族，它们希望结束星系间的混乱并将银河改造成一个新的整体，从而将它们新发现的和平带去全宇宙。
A settlement is a small independent colony that might join you if you have enough influence.
定居点是小型的独立殖民地，如果你拥有足够的影响力，定居点可能会加入你的势力。

Migrate the population of this colony to Assembly. The colony will become an Assembly colony.[br/][br/][fireCol]By migrating the population, {PopulationDeath} of the colonists of the colony will be killed.[/fireCol] [br/][br/]You receive:[br/][fireCol]{Reputation} Reputation[br/]{RaceRelation} Race Relation with the {STR_raceName}[/fireCol]
将殖民地的居民移民为半机械人，之后该殖民地将变为半机械人殖民地。[br/][br/][fireCol]迁移人口后，该殖民地 {PopulationDeath} 的移住民将会死亡。[/fireCol][br/][br/]你获得：[br/][fireCol]{Reputation} 声望[br/]与{STR_raceName}的种族关系 {RaceRelation}[/fireCol]
Colony is currently being migrated to an Assembly population. Process will complete in [INT_duration].
殖民地正迁移为半机械人殖民地，将于 [INT_duration] 后完成。
Are you sure you want to migrate this colony to an Assembly colony?
确定要将该殖民地迁移为半机械人殖民地？

“Ever conversed with an Inspector? I have. I was fleeing. The Assembly sent out dozens of floating three-headed scouts to search for escapees. It was impossible to hide from three heads. While its arc-rod charged, I groveled and begged for mercy. I am small, shameless and entirely nonthreatening. Perhaps that’s why it complained to me. It hated its job. The second head told the first to shut-up. An argument ensued—three heads blaming one another for their predicament. Apparently being fitted as an Inspector is some kind of punishment. That’s how I slipped away.”— Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-2224X: Runaway!”

“你是否曾与巡查者交谈？我曾经有过。当时我正在逃跑，半机械人派出了十几个长着三个头漂浮在空中的侦察兵四处搜寻逃跑者。想要躲过这些三头巡查者根本是不可能的事。当它的电弧棒充能完毕后，我跪倒在地上向它求饶。我渺小、无耻而且没有任何威胁性可言。或许这就是它向我抱怨的原因吧，它说它讨厌自己的工作。然后，第二个脑袋让第一个脑袋闭嘴。一场争论因此产生，三个脑袋互相指责，认为现在的窘境都是对方的过错。显然，被组装成巡查者从某种程度上来讲也是一种惩罚。然后我就趁机溜走了。”- 玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-2224X：逃亡！”

“My mother used to tell fairytales of ghouls looting graveyard crypts, hungry to feast upon the dead. Her stories haunted me when I saw the Assembly Scavengers wandering lost battlefields, harvesting flesh from the fallen. As basic infantry of the Assembly, one of their arms is replaced with a short-ranged shotgun. Yet, Scavengers don’t eat flesh. They use their long vivisecting claws to amputate viable body parts for transplantation. My left leg was removed at the knee in one such unfortunate encounter. Somewhere out there, a part of me fights for my enemy.”— Mazer Ritalli, “RV-9912M: Synthetic Avalanche”

“我的母亲曾经告诉过我一个传说，说世上存在着一种食尸鬼，它们游荡在墓地的地下墓室中搜刮财物，饿了便以死者为食。当我看到半机械人清道夫在战场上游荡，从死者的身上搜刮血肉的时候，我突然就想起了这个故事。作为半机械人最基础的步兵单位，它们的一只手臂由一把近距霰弹枪所取代。但是，清道夫不以血肉为食。它们用精密而修长的爪子截取可用的身体部件，以便日后进行移植。我的左小腿就是在这样一次不幸的遭遇后被移除的，现在它可能已经成为了敌人的一部分。”- 马泽尔·瑞塔利，“RV-9912M：人造雪崩”

“Challenge Assessment: targeted quarry threatens self-immolation; organic assets concealed in a derelict fuel refinery. Residual fuel sufficient to destroy organic assets.[br/]Predictive Damage Assessment (PDA) estimates potential loss of all organic assets.[br/]Tactical Alternative Solution (TAS): deploy Vorpal Snipers. Ranged Crippling and Disabling Attacks required.[br/]Predictive Counter Assessment: melee counteroffensive will attempt to swarm Vorpal Snipers. Counteroffensive exposes organic assets to capture. TAS holds.[br/]Selected Action: deploy Vorpal Snipers.”— OC(H)ypercore-Tactical Decision Node(TDN), “RV-234445C: Assembly Interpreted Pseudocode”

“挑战评估：目标猎物具有自焚威胁；有机财产隐藏在废弃燃油精炼厂中。剩余燃料足以摧毁有机财产。[br/]预测损伤评估 (PDA) 估算可能会损失所有有机财产。[br/]战术替代方案 (TAS)：部署夺命狙击手。需要远程致残打击。[br/]预测反击评估：可能会有近战反击尝试攻击夺命狙击手。反击会导致有机财产进入可捕获状态。TAS 有效。[br/]所选行动：部署致命狙击手。”- OC(H)超核心 - 战术决策节点 (TDN)，“RV-234445C：解释半机械人伪代码”
Edit: Targeted -> targeted Edit: added space before "(PDA)" Edit: Deploy -> deploy Edit: Melee Counteroffensive -> melee counteroffensive Edit: Deploy -> deploy

“Challenge Assessment: Annual Review ranks all Assembly into compliance and efficiency categories to compare with Cost-Benefit Analysis Matrix. Hypercore link directive requires the bottom 10% must be culled from the Assembly. All organic and mechanical parts must be recycled.[br/]Predictive Damage Assessment (PDA): underperformers possess dangerous levels of independence. Potential rebellion invokes unacceptable damage to Assembly assets.[br/]Tactical Alternative Solution (TAS): deploy Electrocutioners. EMP and Electrical stunners will disable units for disassembly.[br/]Predictive Counter Assessment: strong electrical discharge, leaves the body prepped for collection, disassembly, reassembly and reassignment.”— OC(H)ypercore-Tactical Decision Node(TDN), “RV-234445C: Assembly Interpreted Pseudocode”

“挑战评估：年度审查将所有半机械人根据服从性和效率进行了排名分类，以便与成本收益分析矩阵进行对比。超核心连接指令要求必须剔除位于末端的 10% 半机械人。所有有机体和机械零件都必须回收。[br/]预测损伤评估 (PDA)：表现不佳者具有独立危险等级，可能发生的叛乱会对半机械人财产造成无法接受的损害。[br/]可选战术方案 (TAS)：部署电刑者。EMP 和电力眩晕器将会使单位丧失拆解能力。[br/]预测反击评估：强烈的电流释放，使尸体准备好收集、分解、改造和再分配。”- OC(H)超核心 - 战术决策节点 (TDN)，“RV-234445C：解释半机械人伪代码”
Edit: Underperformers -> underperformers Edit: Deploy -> deploy Edit: Strong Electrical -> strong electrical

“Parts are parts. Flesh is flesh.[br/]Bone be bone and heads are heads![br/]Tissue are the issue, muscle, fat, nerves, ligaments.[br/]Skins—no matter if it’s lost its pigments.[br/]All the unguents, fluids, and ichor.[br/]Pumps and gears blend them thicker.[br/]Parts are parts. Flesh is flesh.[br/]Bone is bone and heads are heads![br/]Let’s make life from the dead.”— Reaverson Rux, “RV-68791E: Song of the Assembly - Reverse Engineer”

“零件是零件，血肉是血肉。[br/]骨头是骨头，脑袋就是脑袋！[br/]组织就是组织，肌肉、脂肪、神经还有韧带都是如此。[br/]皮肤，是否已失去了色素并不重要。[br/]所有的油膏、液体和脓水。[br/]泵机和齿轮能够将它们融合得更厚。[br/]零件是零件，血肉是血肉。[br/]骨头是骨头，脑袋就是脑袋！[br/]我们从死者身上创造生命。”- 里弗森·卢克斯，“RV-68791E：半机械人之歌 - 逆转工程师”

“Challenge Assessment: targeted quarry concealed behind a barricade. Chokepoints make assault numbers irrelevant.[br/]Predictive Damage Assessments (PDA): High Casualties.[br/]Tactical Alternative Solution (TAS): deploy Wreckers. Crush all obstacles. Break the outer shell and collect the riches hiding therein. Assault horde can provide support to harvest a counter-swarm.[br/]Predictive Counter Assessment: the colony will swarm the Wrecker with melee attacks, but Wrecker can deploy Wild Strike maneuver. Composition strong. Mobs are nothing more than another obstacle. TAS holds. [br/]Selected Action: deploy Wreckers.”— OC(H)ypercore-Tactical Decision Node(TDN), “RV-231567C: Assembly Interpreted Pseudocode”

“挑战评估：目标猎物躲藏在路障之后。由于阻塞点的存在致使再多次进攻也无济于事。[br/]预测损伤评估 (PDA)：高伤亡率。[br/]可选战术方案 (TAS)：部署破坏者。摧毁所有障碍物，粉碎外壳，然后收集其中的宝藏。突击小队可提供帮助解决反击群体。[br/]预测反击评估：殖民地将使用近战攻击涌向破坏者，但破坏者可采取‘野蛮打击’策略。构成强大。暴乱者不过是另一个障碍物罢了。TAS 有效。[br/]所选行动：部署破坏者。”- OC(H)超核心 - 战术决策节点 (TDN)，“RV-231567C：解释半机械人伪代码”
Edit: Targeted -> targeted Edit: Deploy -> deploy Edit: The -> the Edit: Strong -> strong Edit: Deploy -> deploy

“I’ve seen many tortured bodies pieced together by the Assembly. So much suffering and death. Most sensible life knows that the Assembly is no friend to the living. Still, when I saw the Disassembler fire its massive gun, I recognized twisted glee in its grinning face. That’s when I knew. Some humans willingly joined the Assembly. There is a strain of humanity enamored with guns. They delight to discharge themselves. Disassemblers love blowing up cover, so hiding behind obstacles will get you killed. My tactical advice is simple: run and keep running.”— Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-2222X: Runaway!”

“我见过许多饱受摧残的肉体被半机械人拼凑在一起。它们经历的痛苦与死亡不言而喻。大多数有感知的生命都知道，半机械人并不是生灵的朋友。然而，当我看见拆解者用手中的大炮肆意开火时，我从他狞笑的脸庞中看到了一种扭曲的兴奋。这时我才知道，有些人类愿意加入半机械人。有那么一群人痴迷于枪炮，以拆解自身为乐。拆解者热衷于炸烂掩体，因此躲藏在障碍物后面将会惹来杀身之祸。我的战术建议很简单：跑，并且不要停。”- 玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-2222X：逃亡！”
Edit: period after "gun" changed to comma

“We hoped the Assembly would fail in the sand or run out of energy in the toxic wastelands. That’s when we first saw the Lightning Rider hovering on the horizon. A basic Faraday cage protects its organic parts, while all around its edges it collects energy from the clouds with lighting rods. At first it stood in the sky, collecting the lightning. Then a thunderous arc of electrical energy leapt into our center. They scattered, despite my pleas that we fight back. Did they expect to outrun lightning?”— Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-2223X: Runaway!”
“我们曾希望半机械人在沙漠中会停止运转或是在剧毒的废土上耗尽能源，那正是我们第一次看见闪电骑手驰骋在地平线上的时候。一个基础型法拉第笼子保护着它们的有机部件，其余边缘则用一根根引雷针从云朵中收集能量。起初，它悬浮在天空中收集闪电。随后一道雷鸣般的电弧能量跳到了我们中央。他们四散而逃，尽管我请求发起反击。难道他们还想跑得比闪电还快吗？”- 玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-2223X：逃亡！”
Edit: they collect -> it collects Edit: removed extra space before "At first" Edit: added comma after "scattered"

“I abandoned Jaraon’s lifeless body retreating from the Assembly. Despite diplomatic efforts and their claims to help us, they continue to slaughter us. I witnessed what they did to Jaraon’s body. He was merged with a construct of levers and spidery appendages. His smile writhed as something in that patchwork of puppetry recognized me. Then, as if remembering his life, he let out a shriek, ‘Get away!’ He twitched and lurched forward as an array of claws thrust up at me. I fled as my guardsmen attacked. Riddled with bullets, my dear friend self-destructed.”— Captain Addria Alethra, “RV-4456M: Encounters”

“我在逃脱半机械人追捕的过程中丢下了加拉昂那早已失去了生气的躯体。尽管做了这么多外交努力而且它们也声称会帮助我们，但它们对我们的杀戮行为仍然没有停止。我亲眼目睹了它们对加拉昂的尸体所做的一切。他与一个带有杠杆和蜘蛛肢体一样的构造物融合到了一起。当这个拼凑而成的傀儡认出我的时候，他的脸上露出了扭曲的笑容。接着，他仿佛记起了自己的人生，发出了一阵尖啸：‘快跑！’他一边抽搐着蹒跚而行，一边伸出一排尖爪刺向我。我的卫兵被击中了，但我却趁此机会逃跑了。在一阵枪林弹雨下，我亲爱的朋友自毁了。”- 阿德里亚·阿勒希拉队长，“RV-4456M：遭遇战”

“I abandoned Jaraon’s lifeless body retreating from the Assembly. Despite diplomatic efforts and their claims to help us, they continue to slaughter us. I witnessed what they did to Jaraon’s body. He was merged with a construct of levers and spidery appendages. His smile writhed as something in that patchwork of puppetry recognized me. Then, as if remembering his life, he let out a shriek, ‘Get away!’ He twitched and lurched forward as an array of claws thrust up at me. I fled as my guardsmen attacked. Riddled with bullets, my dear friend self-destructed.”— Captain Addria Alethra, “RV-4456M: Encounters”

“我在逃脱半机械人追捕的过程中丢下了加拉昂那早已失去了生气的躯体。尽管做了这么多外交努力而且它们也声称会帮助我们，但它们对我们的杀戮行为仍然没有停止。我亲眼目睹了它们对加拉昂的尸体所做的一切。他与一个带有杠杆和蜘蛛肢体一样的构造物融合到了一起。当这个拼凑而成的傀儡认出我的时候，他的脸上露出了扭曲的笑容。接着，他仿佛记起了自己的人生，发出了一阵尖啸：‘快跑！’他一边抽搐着蹒跚而行，一边伸出一排尖爪刺向我。我的卫兵被击中了，但我却趁此机会逃跑了。在一阵枪林弹雨下，我亲爱的朋友自毁了。”- 阿德里亚·阿勒希拉队长，“RV-4456M：遭遇战”

“The Assembly were created to save us from a virulent plague. We never anticipated our creation would turn against us. If my research is correct, I’ve isolated our miscalculation in Assembly motivational programming. There is a… presence… in the ‘(I)ntelligent (N)eural (I)nterface & (O)racular (C)onscience (H)ypercore’ . The Assembly adapted the hypercores to control a cyborg-swarm that can gather as the deadly Reaver. Its hunger grows and replicates until nothing remains. I broadcast this warning into the Void. We cannot defeat them. Perhaps you can. We fight the hunger of death itself.”— Professor Lister Tan, “RV-3369C: Fragments from Listening Post Zexxyn-3”

“半机械人的创造初衷是为了将我们从一场肆虐的瘟疫中解救出来，我们从没有想到我们自己的造物会与我们倒戈相向。如果我的研究正确的话，我已经将半机械人的动机编程中错误的算法分离了出来。‘智能 (I) 神经 (N) 接口 (I) & 神谕 (O) 良知 (C) 超核心 (H)’中…存在某种…力量。半机械人调整了超核心，控制了一群半机械虫群，将它们聚集在一起便能构成致命的掠夺者。它的饥饿每日剧增，而且它会不断地复制自身，直至将一切吞噬。我向虚空发布了这则警告。我们没法打败它们，但或许你们可以。我们面对的是死亡本身的饥饿。”- 利斯特·谭教授，“RV-3369C：Zexxyn-3 情报站音频片段”

“The Assembly came for us that night. We gathered the townsfolk together into a defensive knot. Picking through the battlefield, they advanced. For a moment we thought we might destroy the ghastly mechanisms. Charlie, who was supposed to blow the gate, just froze up. His face stretched in terror as a second head appeared above him. Crackling electrical belts encircled him. It was though the ghastly Constrictor pulled the poor man out of reality itself. Many of our shots passed through them as though he were turning into a mirage. It consumed him.”— Mazer Ritalli, “RV-9912M: Synthetic Avalanche”

“半机械人在那天晚上向我们发起了进攻。我们将所有村民集结到了一个防御节点中。扫清战场后，它们继续向前行进。有那么一刻，我们觉得我们也许能够摧毁这些恐怖的机器人。本应该去炸掉大门的查理却呆在原地一动也不动。他的脸上充满了恐惧，紧接着在他的头顶上方又出现了第二张脸，劈啪作响的电带包裹着他。接着，这个恐怖的收束者让可怜的查理脱离了现实。我们的子弹从他们身体中穿了过去，仿佛他已经成为了某种幻影。然后它便将他吞噬。”- 马泽尔·瑞塔利，“RV-9912M：人造雪崩”

“The ships of death brought the darkness. We tried to keep our barges safe, but the Assembly’s Storm Wader ships bring a paralyzing barrage of lighting from the heart of the dark foreboding clouds, leaving our strongest defenders numb and unable to retaliate. With every blast of its arc cannons, the Assembly’s ships strike our vessels. Its Arc weaponry devastated our air support, striking with uncanny accuracy. How do we fight this new enemy? This enemy can assemble itself from the wreckage of our fallen.”— Militiaman Toffee Smith, “RV-3425M: Echoes of the Fallen: Testimonials”

“死亡之船带来了黑暗。我们努力地维持着驳船的安全，但半机械人的风暴跋涉者舰船从乌黑不详的云朵中心发射出了一道令人麻痹的闪光弹幕，将我们最强壮的守护者震得失去了知觉，毫无还手之力。半机械人的船只点燃它们的电弧加农炮攻击着我们的船只，电弧武器摧毁了我们的空中支援，炮火的准确度精确得令人难以置信。我们怎样才能与这些新的敌人战斗？它们能够从我们阵亡之人的残骸上组装自身。”- 卫兵托菲·史密斯，“RV-3425M：亡者的回声：证明书”

“The Assembly filled our only escape-by-sea route with explosive hazards. The Wrecking Ships construct Demolition Ships from the remnants of heavy machinery that fell defending the harbor. They surround us on land, eyeing us like hungry vultures. The earth shatters with the deafening boom of the ship’s main Wrecking Shot. The railguns turn the dockside into splinters. I’ve seen how they piece together the living with the ruins of our broken weaponry to form a new generation of themselves.”— Dolat Dolor, Harbormaster, “RV-3426M: Echoes of the Fallen: Testimonials
“半机械人在我们仅剩的海上逃跑路线上布满了爆炸物。歼灭舰可以利用港口上倒下的重型机械残骸来制作爆破炸弹。它们在陆地上包围了我们，盯着我们犹如一只只饥饿的秃鹫。当舰船主要的歼灭射击发射时，震耳欲聋的响声仿佛能让大地都四分五裂。轨道炮将整个码头边都变成了碎片。我亲眼见过它们用我们破碎的武器残骸与活物拼凑出新的船只。”- 多拉特·多罗尔，“RV-3426M：亡者的回声：证明书”
Edit: "boom of the Wrecking ship's" -> "boom of the ship's"

“I never wanted to be a floating bomb. Mom wanted me to go to college, but I wanted to be a fisherman. When the Wrecking Ship came and started chopping up the ships. I tried to swim away when a mechanical arm reached out and lopped off my head, welding me to the front of a nest of levers and explosives. They stuck something in my brain. I’m being told I’m supposed to blow up now. I don’t know how long I can resist it. I should’ve listened to my mother.”—Fisherman Manuel Morris, “RV-46443D: Assembly of Heads”
“我从来都不想成为一颗漂浮的炸弹。妈妈想让我上大学，但我更想成为一名渔夫。当歼灭舰来临并开始切碎船只时，我试图游走，但一只机械手臂伸了出来，砍掉了我的脑袋，然后把我焊接到了一个满是杠杆和炸药的球体前端。它们把什么东西塞进了我的脑中，然后告诉我说我将会爆炸。我不知道还能坚持多久，我真应该听我妈妈的话。”- 渔夫曼努尔·莫里斯，“RV-46443D：只有头的半机械人”

“I’ve lost most of my body parts, and I admit I’ll never get to feel the wind rushing through my hair, because I’ve had most of my scalp replaced with compliance modules and skillpack hypercores. I never feel more human than when I hop on my hog. Sure, the spinning blades on the wheels remind me to dissect anyone who dares block my path. But then its engine roars and the Chopper zooms down the road. For a moment, I remember life before I was dissected.”— T3X @lam0, “RV-8845M: Individuality and Other Punishable ID Traits”

“我失去了身体上的大多数部位。我承认，我将永远无法感受到微风吹过头发的感觉了，因为我已经将大部分头皮替换成了可塑的模块和技能组超核心。没有任何比我骑在我的猪上时更能让我感觉像是人类的时候了。当然，轮子上旋转的刀刃提醒着我，如果谁敢挡我的路，我就会将谁大卸八块。但一阵引擎声从远方传了过来，一个斩切者挡住了我的道路。有那么一刻，我是多么怀念我被大卸八块之前的生活。”- T3X @lam0，“RV-8845M：个体和其他惩罚性 ID 特性”
Arc Coils are the Assembly colony defense turrets.
电弧线圈是半机械人殖民地的防御炮塔。

Greetings, emissary of the Assembly. Destruction breeds creation - that is certain. From the ruins of the Empire your unique kind has emerged. You forged unity by merging with machines and transplanting the body parts of your enemies. Before you reassemble this entire shattered galaxy, remember that every world has life worth preserving. Not all beings are servile. You will face resistance.
你好，半机械人的密使。破坏能够孕育创造，这是必然的。你们这一独特的族群从帝国的废墟中崛起，你们的士兵由机械和敌人的残躯融合而成。在你们重组这个破碎的星系之前，请谨记每一个世界都有值得被尊重的生命。不是所有的生物都会卑躬屈膝，你们将面临反抗。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

VO: Empress Carminia - Female
Edit: "creation that is for sure" -> "creation - that is certain" Edit: "servile, you" -> "servile. You"
